name: quality-audit-tracking
description: Convert comprehensive code quality audit findings into tracked GitHub issues with epic/tracking organization
author: ProjectScylla Team

skill.name: quality-audit-tracking
skill.description: Complete workflow for converting 15+ audit findings into GitHub issues with tracking
triggers: convert audit plan to tracked issues

key_learnings: Always validate labels with 'gh label list' before batch creation
Use sequential scripts instead of parallel for external API calls
Create tracking issue after first batch, before final batch
Temp files in /tmp/ for intermediate content
